code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{getTasks}from'../api';import TaskItem from'./TaskItem';import TaskForm from'./TaskForm';import'./TaskList.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TaskList=()=>{const[tasks,setTasks]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{const fetchTasks=async()=>{setLoading(true);const tasks=await getTasks();setTasks(tasks);setLoading(false);};fetchTasks();},[]);const handleTaskCreated=task=>{setTasks([...tasks,task]);};const handleTaskUpdated=updatedTask=>{setTasks(tasks.map(task=>task.id===updatedTask.id?updatedTask:task));};const handleTaskDeleted=taskId=>{setTasks(tasks.filter(task=>task.id!==taskId));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"task-list",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"task-form-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TaskForm,{onTaskCreated:handleTaskCreated})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"task-list-title",children:"Task List"}),loading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading tasks..."}):tasks.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No tasks available."}):tasks.map(task=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"task-list-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TaskItem,{task:task,onTaskUpdated:handleTaskUpdated,onTaskDeleted:handleTaskDeleted})},task.id))]});};export default TaskList;
